results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Decks Set of 2

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty - Commander Decks [Set of 2] contains 1 of each themed Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander decks.
Each Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.

results.name: Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty - Commander Decks [Set of 2]

results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Deck Display

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty - Commander Deck Display contains 4 Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander decks, 2 of each theme.
Each Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.

results.name: Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty - Commander Deck Display

results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Deck Buckle Up

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The Buckle Up Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.
Key Features:
• 100-card ready-to-play Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander deck
• Deck includes 2 traditional foils + 98 nonfoil cards
• 1 foil-etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker and deck box
• Introduces 15 MTG cards not found in the main set

results.name: Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck - Buckle Up

results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Deck Upgrades Unleashed

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
(Please Note: The Upgrades Unleashed Commander deck was inadvertently printed with two copies of Mossfire Valley instead of an additional basic land. Players wanting to play the deck in Commander should swap out the extra copy of Mossfire Valley for a basic land or the land of their choice.)

The Upgrades Unleashed Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.
Key Features:
• 100-card ready-to-play Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander deck
• Deck includes 2 traditional foils + 98 nonfoil cards
• 1 foil-etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker and deck box
• Introduces 15 MTG cards not found in the main set

results.name: Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck - Upgrades Unleashed

results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Deck Buckle Up Minimal Packaging

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The Buckle Up Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.
Key Features:
• Minimal packaging for less waste
• 100-card ready-to-play Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander deck
• Deck includes 2 traditional foils + 98 nonfoil cards
• 1 foil-etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker and deck box
• Introduces 15 MTG cards not found in the main set

results.name: Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck - Buckle Up (Minimal Packaging)

results.cleanName: Kamigawa Neon Dynasty Commander Deck Upgrades Unleashed Minimal Packaging

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
(Please Note: The Upgrades Unleashed Commander deck was inadvertently printed with two copies of Mossfire Valley instead of an additional basic land. Players wanting to play the deck in Commander should swap out the extra copy of Mossfire Valley for a basic land or the land of their choice.)
The Upgrades Unleashed Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.
Key Features:
• 100-card ready-to-play Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Commander deck
• Deck includes 2 traditional foils + 98 nonfoil cards
